DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To determine effect non-closure visceral parietal peritoneum Cesarean section formation adhesion . Study design : A prospective randomize trial 533 woman undergo primary Cesarean section ; 256 randomize non closure 277 closure peritoneum . At subsequent cesarean , presence adhesion severity evaluate several site : layer abdominal wall , bladder abdominal wall , bladder uterus , uterus abdominal wall , bowel pelvic organ . A cumulative adhesion score calculate .
DOC.brief_title: Closure Peritoneum Cesarean Section Postoperative Adhesion
